titleInfo.title: Close-up of Sergeant Alvin C. York

mods.abstract: Close-up photograph of Sergeant Alvin Cullum York (1887-1964) a few days before his 52nd birthday.

titleInfo.title: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976

relatedItem.abstract: Alvin Cullum York (1887-1964) was one of the most decorated soldiers of the First World War. A recipient of the Medal of Honor and the French Legion of Honour, York is considered one of the greatest of Tennesseeâ€™s native sons...
